title: Jonas Vingegaard: It’s a ‘Good Thing’ Riders Are Tested so Often
content:
The two-time Tour de France champion says he has missed one out-of-competition anti-doping test during his career, but did not say when it was.

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard: It’s a ‘Good Thing’ Riders Are Tested so Often on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
